document.full_text: radiation measured at a village 40 km (25 miles) from japan's crippled nuclear plant is falling by the day, the u.n. atomic agency said on friday, two days after warning the level exceeded a criterion for evacuation.
document.title: radiation eases in japan village near no-go zone
lines_and_colors: radiation measured at a village 40 km (25 miles) from japan's crippled nuclear plant is falling by the day, the u.n. atomic agency said on friday, two days after warning the level exceeded a criterion for evacuation.
